Russia: Dmitrievich's second son, Dmitry Shemyaka, allied himself with Vasili II. Vasili the Cross-Eyed was expelled from the Kremlin and blinded. Vasili II returned to the throne of the Grand Prince.
Estonia: The Livonian Confederation is established to solve internal disputes in Livonia.
China: The Xuande Emperor's son the Zhengtong Emperor became emperor of the Ming dynasty.
